phishing.title: Check the Sender
phishing.description: Verify the email address carefully. Scammers often use addresses that look similar to legitimate ones.
action_items: Look for slight misspellings in email addresses
Hover over sender name to see actual email address

phishing.title: Verify Links
phishing.description: Always check where links lead before clicking them.
action_items: Hover over links to see destination URL
Look for subtle misspellings in URLs
Use our URL scanner before clicking

deepfake.title: Check for Visual Artifacts
deepfake.description: Look for common signs of deepfake manipulation in images and videos.
action_items: Check for blurry or inconsistent areas

password.title: Create Strong Passwords
password.description: Use complex passwords to protect your accounts.

general.title: Keep Software Updated
general.description: Regular updates help protect against known vulnerabilities.
